statusLine.command: current_dir=$(pwd); base_dir=$(basename "$current_dir"); git_branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); kube_context=$(kubectl config current-context 2>/dev/null | cut -d'/' -f2 2>/dev/null || echo ''); time_now=$(date '+%H:%M'); cost_report=$(bun x ccusage statusline --visual-burn-rate emoji 2>/dev/null || echo ''); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then git_info=" on $git_branch"; else git_info=''; fi; if [ -n "$kube_context" ]; then kube_info=" [k8s:$kube_context]"; else kube_info=''; fi; if [ -n "$cost_report" ]; then cost_info=" | $cost_report"; else cost_info=''; fi; printf "\033[2m%s%s%s | %s%s\033[0m" "$base_dir" "$git_info" "$kube_info" "$time_now" "$cost_info"
